Welcome to the Dominion League!

A competitive tournament for fans of any skill level, that is free to join.

Sign up now!

Each season of the Dominion League is a round robin tournament that lasts 6 weeks. The tournament is hosted at the Dominion Discord server. It is a fun and friendly competition where you can learn more about the game, and meet other fans.

New to Dominion? Learn more about the game

Get matched with a group of 5 other players at your same skill level

Compete against each other to win the most Dominion games

Advance up the League tiers by winning in your group!

Join the over 800 players already competing in the Dominion League. Follow the sign up link to begin the signup process.
